definitions.definition: A final game in a series needed to break a tie .
A short series of games to select a league champion .
A short series of games to select the last team to be promoted (to elevate to a higher league).
A short piece of underscore played during a scene transition in a stage musical, usually reprising a song from the preceding scene.

main_definition: A final game in a series needed to break a tie .
secondary_definitions: ( US ) A short series of games to select a league champion .
( UK ) A short series of games to select the last team to be promoted (to elevate to a higher league).
A short piece of underscore played during a scene transition in a stage musical, usually reprising a song from the preceding scene.
